children.subject: If you look at the Schedule of Classes you'll see that some of the lectures say "Time Conflict Enrollment Allowed" under the Instruction Mode, and some do not. 61B does not. You can double-check with Cindy Conners, but I believe that this means that Professor Hilfinger has not opted to offer an alternate final. Cindy's told me that each faculty member must now opt in to offer that alternate final time, and that's when she enters that notice about time conflict enrollment being allowed. You'll probably need to check and see whether your other professor can offer you an alternate final time.

history.content: I have another final at the same time, thank you!
history.subject: Does 61B with Hilfinger allow time conflicts for finals? (fall 2021)
